hero.subtitle: We work with a portfolio that is not published on real estate portals but is of high quality. Our clients entrust us with valuable secrets, and we return successful businesses.

legacy.title: A Legacy of Honor
legacy.text1: The tradition of Urbina Agency is not born in the market, but in honor and service. Our DNA comes from Francisco and Angelita Urbina, my grandparents.
legacy.text2: And from my great-grandfather, Jose Maria Urbina, a high-ranking military officer. From him, we learned that the most valuable information is protected.
legacy.secrets_text: We treat every investment intention as high-level classified information.
legacy.success_text: The only trace we leave is success.

footer.title: FOR INVESTORS
footer.description: Specialists in high-value real estate asset management.

seo.title: For Investors | Luxury Real Estate Assets Worldwide
seo.description: Exclusive portfolio of hotels, land, wineries, and ultra-luxury properties. Expert management by Urbina Agency LLC.

search.title: Off-Market Asset Search
search.subtitle: Access the largest database of hidden assets in Spain and Europe.
search.results_found: We have detected off-market assets available in
search.cta_text: For confidentiality reasons, we do not publish details. Complete the form to receive the blind dossier.
search.no_results: No public results. Contact us for a custom search.

investments.title: Real Estate Investments
investments.description: Comprehensive investment portfolio management. We detect high-yield opportunities in the global real estate market.
investments.longDescription: Our Real Estate Investment division not only seeks assets but designs capital strategies. We analyze market trends, economic cycles, and appreciation opportunities to offer products that fit the risk and return profile of institutional investors and family offices.
investments.details: Tailored strategies: Core, Value-Add, and Opportunistic.
features: Comprehensive technical, legal, and financial Due Diligence.

hotels.title: Hotels for Sale
hotels.description: Exclusive selection of hotel assets in major tourist areas of Spain, Europe, and global destinations.
hotels.longDescription: The hotel sector is the jewel of our crown. We have direct access to owners of hotel chains, independent boutique hotels, and luxury resorts operating 'off-market'. We look for assets with repositioning potential, flexible management contracts, or stabilized yields in irreplaceable locations.
hotels.details: Management, franchise, or pure purchase opportunities.
features: Urban hotels in European capitals (Madrid, Paris, London).
Beachfront vacation resorts (Balearic Islands, Costa del Sol).
Buildings with hotel license for renovation.

land.title: Land for Sale
land.description: Finalist, developable, and rustic land in strategic locations for large developments.
land.longDescription: The basis of any great project is land. Our land portfolio includes finalist plots ready for license application (Ready-to-build), medium-term urban developments, and large tracts of rustic land for renewable energy projects or agricultural use. We rigorously verify the urban planning status of every square meter.
land.details: Residential, logistics, commercial, and tertiary land.
features: Logistics land in strategic communication hubs.
Tertiary land for shopping centers or offices.

luxury.title: Luxury Properties for Sale
luxury.description: Unique villas and penthouses in prime locations. The ultimate exponent of residential exclusivity.
luxury.longDescription: We understand luxury not just as a price, but as a life experience. Our 'Luxury Properties' selection includes the most exclusive residences on the market: villas in La Zagaleta, penthouses in Salamanca District, or historic mansions on the Côte d'Azur. Privacy, security, and architectural design without compromise.
features: Penthouses with panoramic views in financial centers.

wineries.title: Wineries for Sale
wineries.description: Investments in the wine sector: D.O. wineries, vineyards, and production centers.
wineries.longDescription: Investing in a winery is investing in culture, history, and land. We offer opportunities in the most prestigious wine regions (Rioja, Ribera del Duero, Bordeaux, Napa Valley). From family wineries with consolidated brands to large bulk production centers, we analyze production capacity and brand value.
wineries.details: Productive assets with real estate and brand value.
features: Wineries with Qualified Designation of Origin.
Wine tourism facilities and winery hotels.

faqs_subtitle: Everything you need to know before investing with us.

faqs.question: What type of investors can access your portfolio?
faqs.answer: We work exclusively with qualified investors, Family Offices, and institutional funds capable of proving solvency for operations starting from €1M.

faqs.question: Why do you require Proof of Funds (POF) before seeing details?
faqs.answer: To protect the confidentiality of our sellers and off-market assets. We only share sensitive information (exact location, metrics) with verified buyers.

faqs.question: Do you manage the Golden Visa for non-EU investors?
faqs.answer: Yes. We have a legal department specialized in processing residency by investment (Golden Visa) for clients acquiring assets over €500,000.

faqs.question: Do you charge fees to the buyer or the seller?
faqs.answer: It depends on the mandate. In direct off-market operations, our fees are usually included in the sale price or agreed upon through a buy-side mandate.

agencies_page.title: Global Alliance for Agencies
agencies_page.subtitle: Join the largest global network of independent agencies. We centralize demand from large capital.
agencies_page.disclaimer: * Restricted access. Requires manual activation after contract signing.
agencies_page.collaboration_text_1: We are not a portal, we are an **Alliance**. We sign a collaboration agreement that protects your mandate and guarantees a fair commission split (50/50) on every jointly closed operation.
agencies_page.collaboration_text_2: Once the contract is signed, you will be given access to our private platform where you can:
benefits_list: Upload your portfolio of exclusive properties visible only to verified investors.
Receive automated requests from investors matching your assets.
Access our 'Wanted' list by Large Capital.
agencies_page.verified_demand_text: We bring you buyers who have already passed the Proof of Funds (POF).
agencies_page.global_exposure_text: Your local assets will travel directly to offices in Dubai, New York, and London.
agencies_page.form_subtitle: Complete the profile to receive the collaboration contract.
agencies_page.form_explanation: Enter your agency details to verify eligibility. We will contact you to formalize the shared sales mandate.

contact_global.title: Contact Us
contact_global.explanation: To verify your investor profile and grant you access to our private platform with username and password, we need to validate your Proof of Funds (POF). Once validated, you will receive personalized investment offers tailored to your needs and available capital.

labels.location_interest: Where do you want to invest?

status.sent_agency_text: We have received your application. Our legal team will send the collaboration agreement to activate your access.
status.sent_investor_text: Your application has been received. The verification team will review your POF and contact you within 24h.
status.error: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.
status.connection_error: Connection error. Please check your internet and try again.

goals.request_access: I request access to the Private Platform to view exclusive opportunities.

steps.agencies_subtitle: Follow these steps to join our global alliance and start closing deals.
steps.investors_subtitle: A clear and secure path to access the best off-market opportunities.

agencies.title: Access Request
agencies.description: Fill out the form. If you pass the filter, you will receive an access email.

agencies.title: Register & Sign
agencies.description: Enter your agency details and digitally sign the collaboration contract.

agencies.title: Upload Properties
agencies.description: Upload the properties for which you seek qualified investors.

agencies.title: Smart Matching
agencies.description: The system will match your assets with large capital investors.

agencies.title: Receive Interest
agencies.description: Get contacts from investors interested in each property.

agencies.title: Close Sale
agencies.description: If you close the sale, enter the details and mark the asset as sold.

agencies.title: Payment & Invoice
agencies.description: Pay the shared commission and receive your service invoice.

investors.title: Request & POF
investors.description: Fill out the form and submit your Proof of Funds (POF).

investors.title: Verification
investors.description: We will review your request and grant platform access via email.

investors.title: Sign Mandate
investors.description: Sign the mandate to receive properties matching your profile.

investors.title: Receive Offers
investors.description: You will receive opportunities from our international agency network.

investors.title: Purchase & Fee
investors.description: Close the deal and pay the commission to the platform.
